paragraph.paragraph: EiffelEnvision is a completed langage plug-in, also known as a package, for Visual Studio .NET 2003. It facilitates developers with the ease in which existing languages, such as Visual C# and Visual Basic .NET, provide to create an manage project but with the power of Eiffel and eiffel_for_dotnet/index.xmlEiffel for .NET. EiffelEnvision integrates the Eiffel languages into Visual Studio .NET seamlessly, exploiting the rich tool set found in Visual Studio .NET.

Because EiffelEnvision integrates with the Visual Studio .NET IDE, Eiffel for .NET programmers can use Visual Studio .NET designers to create XML Web services and Windows Forms applications. In addition, Eiffel Software's library suit is also available allowing developers to create windows application using the EiffelVision 2 mulit-platform library.
Many new feature additions and enhancements have been made in this release of EiffelEnvision making it an uncompabable rival to previous releases.
